meanings.definition: A type of lettuce with tightly packed, firm leaves.
meanings.sent1: I picked a fresh crisphead from the garden for our salad.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on crispheads, so I bought a few.
meanings.sent3: Why did the crisphead lettuce win an award? Because it was outstanding!
meanings.sent4: Her crisphead of lettuce was a green bouquet on the dinner table.
meanings.sent5: The crisphead lettuce crunched loudly with each bite, satisfyingly crisp.

meanings.definition: A head of lettuce with a compact, round shape.
meanings.sent1: The crisphead lettuce looked like a little green ball on the plate.
meanings.sent2: She carefully washed the crisphead before making a delicious salad.
meanings.sent3: The crisphead lettuce rolled off the counter and bounced across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The crisphead of lettuce sat proudly at the center of the vegetable platter.
meanings.sent5: The crisphead lettuce was so perfectly round, it almost seemed artificial.
